Package org.smartfrog.tools.ant

Interface Summary
SysPropertyAdder interface for use by anything you can add sys properties to.
 

Class Summary
Codebase this contains information pointing to the location of code.
Daemon A daemon is a (host,port) tuple.
DeployingTaskBase This class is used as an extended base for those tasks that do deployment, as it supports declaring of applications as nested elements.
DeployingTaskBase.Application the name and url of an application.
FaultingWaitForTask An unsupported, potentially unstable derivative of waitfor that will made to fail on timeout.
FunctionalTestTask This is an extension of <junit> that lets us integrate startup, a waitfor condition and a shutdown sequence into the test case.
IsDeployed This is a condition that tests for things being deployed.
Parse This task parses smartfrog files and validates them.
PingTask Probe the health of a deployed application.
ProjectHelper Ant Project help created 14-Mar-2006 16:17:39
PropertyFile A type that holds property files created Jul 26, 2004 1:01:50 PM
PropertyFile.PropertyFileList a list class for this class
RunApplicationTask Run an application by deploying it locally; only return from ant after it has finished.
Security This is a datatype for the smartfrog tasks, one that takes security settings.
SecurityHolder Holder class for security for any task that needs it.
SmartFrogJVMProperties Single location for all JVM properties created Jul 6, 2004 2:46:28 PM
SmartFrogSign  
SmartFrogTask Class to let ant task derivatives run smartfrog.
StartApplication Start an SF application, an application which will run asynchronously until stopped by another mechanism.
StartDaemon Start a daemon.
StartManagementConsole Start the SmartFrog management console
StartSmartFrogGui Start the smartfrog editor/management GUI
StopApplication Undeploy any smartfrog application from a running daemon.
StopDaemon Ant task to stop a smartfrog daemon on a host As the daemon is just another process, this is implemented as a call to shut down the application named 'rootProcess'.
TaskBase This is a foundation task that manages classpath setup for everything underneath.
TaskHelper  
ToUrlTask This task takes a file and turns it into a URL, which it then assigns to a property.
